alert.note: Alert for Coastal Levy (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued June 21 at 3:45AM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: .Moisture streaming into the Florida peninsula from the Gulf of Mexico will lead to multiple rounds of heavy rainfall through at least Thursday. ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT THROUGH THURSDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...A portion of west central Florida, including the following areas, Coastal Levy and Inland Levy. * WHEN...Through Thursday evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Additional rainfall amounts of 3 to 5 inches is forecast through Thursday, with locally higher totals possible. These heavy rainfall amounts over saturated soil conditions may lead to flooding. - https://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
